ygData.subject: The Bodicons
ygData.msgSnippet: A small spacecraft passes through the Earth s atmosphere, and is about to land near a Decepticon ship, called the Dark Avian.  Inside the spacecraft were 5

------=_NextPart_000_00BB_01C0A405.D40BAAA0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

     A small spacecraft passes through the Earth's atmosphere, and is about=
 to land near a Decepticon ship, called the Dark Avian.  Inside the spacecr=
aft were 5 bots, all of Decepticon allegiance, and all belonging to a sub-g=
roup known as the Bodicons.  They landed near the Dark Avian.  The ship's h=
atch opened up, and out stepped a bot who looked like the leader.

      "M=
uahaha!  I, Decapitron, leader of the Bodicons, arise once again to fight f=
or the Decepticons!!!!!" He shouted in pride.

      4 other bots stepped o=
ut of the small spacecraft.  Their names were-

     "Gutclaw, at your serv=
ice!" 

     "Legtrap, ready for battle sir!"

     "Explobody here!  Ready=
 to blow up some Autobots!"

     "Autobots, prepare to face the wrath of H=
eadshot!"

      Decapitron grinned.

      "Glad to see that you're all up=
 and ready," he credited them.

      Decapitron saw the Dark Avian, and th=
en he saw the Decepticon troops going out to battle.

      "Well, they're =
Decepticons, but I've never met them.  I'm sure they won't mind if we watch=
 this base for them," he said.

      "Explobody and Gutclaw, go join those=
 Decepticons, and ask them about this rock, Headshot and Legtrap, let's go =
inside the base, see how much information we can get on our new fellow Dece=
pticons," Decapitron gave orders.
    
      Decapitron, Headshot and Legtr=
ap went inside the base.  Meanwhile, Explobody transformed to Bird Bomber m=
ode, and flew off following Cyclonus and co. and Gutclaw followed in Mechan=
ical Velociraptor mode.'

      Inside the Dark Avian, Decapitron, Legtrap =
and HEadshot went into the control room.  Bots had been in this room not lo=
ng ago.  Decapitron had experience with controls, and pressed a button to s=
how messages that had been recently sent or recieved over the com.

     "T=
he Stunticons are here?  Wow!" Headshot exclaimed, looking at the names.

 =
    "I wouldn't be surprised if the Constructicons were here, or the Terror=
cons," Decapitron said.

     Decapitron and Headshot sat down and relaxed,=
 watching the radar, and waiting for any messages that might come.  Legtrap=
 went to the mess hall, and came back to the control room with a glass of e=
nergin.  

     "Hey, Legtrap, bring me some energon cubes!" Decapitron dem=
anded.

     "Go get it your......" Legtrap said, but Decapitron glared at =
him,"Uh, yes sir!"

      Legtrap went to the messhall again, and brought b=
ack an energon cube for Decapitron, and a glass of energin for Headshot.  T=
hey sat in the control room with their refreshments, and talked and waited.=
  

     Explobody and Gutclaw continued to follow Triggerhappy, Skullgrin,=
 Cyclonus and co. to wherever they were heading.
